blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body: Get paid for your hard work. Google AdSense can automatically display relevant targeted ads on your blog so that you can earn income by posting about your passion.
blogs.author: satvika

blogs.title: opening party
blogs.body: Find out which posts are a hit with Blogger’s built-in analytics. You’ll see where your audience is coming from and what they’re interested in. You can even connect your blog directly to Google Analytics for a more detailed look.
blogs.author: rohan
